summary: My first mod, Dragonslayer's Rest is a short, simple lore-friendly dungeon and home to an ancient nordic hero. Now long forgotten by the world, his tomb has been occupied by bandits preying on the nearby townsfolk.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#ffff00][size=6]Dragonslayer's Rest[/size][/color]
[size=4]A new dungeon for Skyrim by LewisEld
[/size][/center][b][size=3]What is Dragonslayer's Rest?[/size]
[/b]A small, relatively simple (lore-friendly) dungeon for Skyrim, located near Riverwood. As the name suggests, the dungeon is the final resting place of a long forgotten Nordic hero, but now it's been infested with bandits and criminals looking to make the ancient tomb a new hideout. Why not go inside and try and take them out?

[size=3][b]Compatibility andÂ Dependencies
[/b][/size]Dragonslayer's Rest is compatible with all mods that don't modify the same area as the dungeon's exterior.

It only requires you have the base game, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. No DLCs or mods are required to play this dungeon.

[size=3][b]My First Mod
[/b][/size]Please bear in mind that this is my first ever mod before downloading- any constructive criticism or bug reports would be greatly appreciated! I was just looking to get some practice with this dungeon, and any help/tips improving future mods would be great!

[size=3][b]Other Info
[/b][/size]Thanks for taking a look at my mod; I hope you enjoy it, even though it's relatively small. [b]Any [/b]feedback would be fantastic, and maybe even endorse my mod if you want?
author: LewisEld
